data.title: 7 February 2017: TPF closes private offering and bank financing
data.meta_description: This Highlight gives an overview about "7 February 2017: TPF closes private offering and bank financing". Find out more on Chambers and Partners.
data.text:
Transports publics fribourgeois Trafic (TPF TRAFIC) SA closed the financing of its maintenance and exploitation centre in the canton of Fribourg. The financing was partly made through a CHF 40 mio. private

placement, a CHF 32 mio. secured bank loan and a CHF 55 mio. unsecured bank loan.

Walder Wyss advised TPF on the financing. The Walder Wyss team was led by Alexandre Both (Counsel, Banking & Finance) and included Nicolas Iynedjian (Partner, Lausanne), Thomas Meister (Partner, Tax) and Robert Desax (Managing Associate, Tax).
